Daniel Alves Gonçalves - 874770

Atividades:

01a.) 
	a.) C1,6 (1011(2)) = 001011(2) = C1,6 (110100(2)) 
	b.) C1,8 (1100(2)) = 00001100(2) = C1,8 (11110011(2))
	c.) C2,6 (100011(2)) = C2,6 (011101(2))
	d.) C2,7 (101001(2)) = 0101001(2) = C2,7 (1010111(2))
	e.) C2,8 (111010(2)) = 00111010(2) = C2,8 (11000110(2))
01b.)
	Guia_0301 - Tests
	a = 00001010 -> C1(a) = 11110101 -> C2(a) = 11110110
	b = 0000101 -> C1(b) = 1111010 -> C2(b) = 1111011
	c = 000101 -> C1(c) = 111010 -> C2(c) = 111011
-------------------------------------
02a.)
	a.) C1,6 (123(4)) = 011011(2) = C1,6 (100100(2))
	b.) C1,8 (C4(16)) = 11000100(2) = C1,8 (00111011(2))
	c.) C2,6 (312(4)) = C2,6 (110101(2))
	d.) C2,10 (153(8)) = 011001011(2) = C2,10 (100110101(2))
	e.) C2,8 (7D(16)) = 01111101(2) = C2,8 (10000011(2))
02b.)
	Guia_0302 - Tests
	a = 00001010 -> C1(a) = 11110101 -> C2(a) = 11110110
	b = 0001101 -> C1(b) = 1110010 -> C2(b) = 1110011
	c = 001101 -> C1(c) = 110010 -> C2(c) = 110011
-------------------------------------
03a.)
	a.) 10101(2) = 21(10)
	b.) 110101(2) = 53(10)
	c.) 100110(2) = 38(10)
	d.) 1010111(2) = 87(10)
	e.) 1110101(2) = 75(16)
03b.)
	Guia_0303 - Tests
	a = 11111010 -> C1(a) = 00000101 -> C2(a) = 00000110 =    6 =   6
	b = 1111101 -> C1(b) = 0000010 -> C2(b) = 00000011 =    3 =   3
	c = 111110 -> C1(c) = 000001 -> C2(c) = 00000010 =    2 =   2
-------------------------------------
04a.)
	a.) 11101(2) - 1101(2) = 11101(2) + C2,5(10011(2)) = (1)10000(2) = 10000(2)
	b.) 101,1001(2) - 10,01(2) = 101,1001(2) + C2,6(101,1100(2)) = (1)011,0101(2) = 11,0101(2)
	c.) 321(4) - 213(4) = 11001(2) - 10011(2) = 11001 + C2,5(01101) = (1)00110(2) = 12(4)
	d.) 354(8) - 265(8) = 11110100(2) - 10110101(2) = 11110100 + C2,8(01001011) = (1)01000011(2) = 103(8)
	e.) 6A2(16) - C14(16) = 011010100010(2) - 110000010100(2) = 011010100010 + C2,12(001111101100) = (1)10101001000(2) = AA8(16)
04b.)	
	Guia_0304 - Tests
	a = 11111010 =   -6
	b =  1111101 =  -3
	c =   000110 =   6
	d = a-b = 11111010- 1111101 = 11111101 =   -3
	d = b-a =  1111101-11111010 = 00000011 =    3
	d = a-c = 11111010-  000110 = 11110100 =  -12
	d = c-a =   000110-11111010 = 00001100 =   12
-------------------------------------
05a.)
	a.) 110110(2) – 1101(2)
	110110(2) – 1101(2) = 00110110(2) + C2,8(11110011(2)) = 11101001(2) 

	b.) 101,1011(2) – 3,4(8)
	3,4(8) = 011.100(2)
	101,1011(2) – 011.100(2) = 101.1011(2) + C2,6(100.011(2)) = 101.0000(2)

	c.) 231(4) – 3A(16)
	231(4) = 01001101(2)
	3A(16) = 00111010(2)
	01001101(2) + C2,8(11000110(2)) = 10010011(2) 

	d.) D3(16) – 1011101(2)
	D3(16) = 11010011(2)
	11010011(2) + C2,8(10100011(2)) = 10110110(2)

	e.) 5E(16) – 3C(16)
	5E(16) = 01011110(2)
	3C(16) = 00111100(2)
	01011110(2) + C2,8(11000100(2)) = 10100010(2)
05b.)
	Guia_0305 - Tests

	Overflow
	a =           8 = 000 = 0
	b =          34 = 0010 =  2
	c =         -33 = 11111 = 31

	Complements
	0=          -2 = 00000000000000000000000000000000 = 11111111111111111111111111111110
	1=          -1 = 00000000000000000000000000000001 = 11111111111111111111111111111111
	2=           2 = 00000000000000000000000000000010 = 11111111111111111111111111111110
